constÂ basePath = dirMonitorOutput;Â // ä¾‹å¦‚: "/data/xhs/20250618"

constÂ textFiles = [];Â // å­˜å‚¨æ–‡æœ¬æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„

constÂ imageExtensions = ['.png',Â '.jpg',Â '.jpeg',Â '.gif',Â '.bmp',Â '.webp',Â '.svg'];

// å›¾ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„å‰ç¼€
constÂ imagePathPrefix =Â '/root/n8n-i18n-chinese';

ifÂ (fileListString &&Â typeofÂ fileListString ===Â 'string') {
Â Â constÂ filenames = fileListString.trim().split('\n');

Â Â forÂ (constÂ filenameÂ ofÂ filenames) {
Â  Â Â constÂ trimmedFilename = filename.trim();
Â  Â Â ifÂ (trimmedFilename ===Â '') {
Â  Â  Â Â continue;Â // è·³è¿‡ç©ºè¡Œï¼ˆå¦‚æœå­˜åœ¨ï¼‰
Â  Â  }

Â  Â Â // æ„å»ºå®Œæ•´çš„æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
Â  Â Â // ç¡®ä¿ basePath å’Œ filename æ­£ç¡®æ‹¼æ¥ï¼Œé¿å…åŒæ–œæ æˆ–æ— æ–œæ 
Â  Â Â letÂ fullPath = basePath;
Â  Â Â ifÂ (!basePath.endsWith('/')) {
Â  Â  Â  fullPath +=Â '/';
Â  Â  }
Â  Â  fullPath += trimmedFilename;

Â  Â Â constÂ lowerFilename = trimmedFilename.toLowerCase();

Â  Â Â // åˆ¤æ–­æ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹å¹¶æ·»åŠ åˆ°å¯¹åº”æ•°ç»„
Â  Â Â ifÂ (lowerFilename.endsWith('.txt')) {
Â  Â  Â  textFiles.push(fullPath);
Â  Â  }Â elseÂ ifÂ (imageExtensions.some(extÂ =>Â lowerFilename.endsWith(ext))) {
Â  Â  Â Â // ä¸ºå›¾ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶æ·»åŠ å‰ç¼€
Â  Â  Â Â constÂ imageFullPath = imagePathPrefix + fullPath;
Â  Â  Â  imageFiles.push(imageFullPath);
Â  Â  }
Â  Â Â // å¦‚æœéœ€è¦ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨è¿™é‡Œæ·»åŠ æ›´å¤šæ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹çš„åˆ¤æ–­é€»è¾‘
Â  }
}

// è¿”å›å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ ¼å¼çš„ç»“æœ
returnÂ {

constÂ items = $input.all();
constÂ results = [];

items.forEach(itemÂ =>Â {
Â Â letÂ content =Â null;
Â Â letÂ success =Â false;
Â Â 
Â Â ifÂ (item.binaryÂ && item.binary.dataÂ && item.binary.data.data) {
Â  Â Â tryÂ {
Â  Â  Â Â constÂ buffer =Â Buffer.from(item.binary.data.data,Â 'base64');
Â  Â  Â  content = buffer.toString('utf8');
Â  Â  Â  success =Â true;
Â  Â  }Â catchÂ (error) {
Â  Â  Â Â console.log('è§£æé”™è¯¯:', error.message);
Â  Â  }
Â  }
Â Â 
Â  results.push({
Â  Â Â content: content,
Â  Â Â success: success,
Â  Â Â original_data: item.json
Â  });
});

returnÂ results;

constÂ inputData = $input.all();
constÂ results = [];

inputData.forEach(itemÂ =>Â {
Â Â constÂ data = item.json;
Â Â 
Â Â // å¤„ç†æ•°ç»„æˆ–å•ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡
Â Â letÂ outputArray =Â Array.isArray(data) ? data : [data];
Â Â 
Â  outputArray.forEach(outputItemÂ =>Â {
Â  Â Â // è·å–markdownå†…å®¹
Â  Â Â letÂ markdownContent = outputItem.outputÂ || outputItem;
Â  Â Â 
Â  Â Â // æ¸…ç†markdownä»£ç å—æ ‡è®°
Â  Â  markdownContent = markdownContent.replace(/^```markdown\n?/,Â '').replace(/\n?```$/,Â '');
Â  Â Â 
Â  Â Â // æŒ‰è¡Œåˆ†å‰²
Â  Â Â constÂ lines = markdownContent.split('\n');
Â  Â Â 
Â  Â Â // æå–æ ‡é¢˜å’Œå†…å®¹
Â  Â Â letÂ title =Â '';
Â  Â Â letÂ content =Â '';
Â  Â Â 
Â  Â  lines.forEach(lineÂ =>Â {
Â  Â  Â Â constÂ trimmedLine = line.trim();
Â  Â  Â Â 
Â  Â  Â Â // æå–ä¸»æ ‡é¢˜ (ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª # å¼€å¤´çš„)
Â  Â  Â Â ifÂ (trimmedLine.startsWith('# ') && !title) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  title = trimmedLine.substring(2).trim();
Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  Â Â // å…¶ä»–æ‰€æœ‰å†…å®¹ä½œä¸ºæ­£æ–‡ï¼ˆå»é™¤markdownæ ¼å¼ï¼‰
Â  Â  Â Â elseÂ ifÂ (trimmedLine) {
Â  Â  Â  Â Â // ç®€å•å»é™¤markdownæ ¼å¼
Â  Â  Â  Â Â constÂ cleanLine = trimmedLine
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  .replace(/^#{1,6}\s+/,Â '') Â  Â  Â // å»é™¤æ ‡é¢˜æ ‡è®°
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  .replace(/\*\*([^*]+)\*\*/g,Â '$1') Â // å»é™¤åŠ ç²—
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  .replace(/^\-\s+/,Â '') Â  Â  Â  Â  Â // å»é™¤åˆ—è¡¨æ ‡è®°
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  .replace(/^\d+\.\s+/,Â ''); Â  Â  Â // å»é™¤æ•°å­—åˆ—è¡¨
Â  Â  Â  Â Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â Â ifÂ (cleanLine) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  content += (content ?Â ' 'Â :Â '') + cleanLine;
Â  Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  });
Â  Â Â 
Â  Â  results.push({
Â  Â  Â Â title: title,
Â  Â  Â Â content: content,
Â  Â  });
Â  });
});

returnÂ results;

functionÂ extractWithRegex(htmlFragment, regex, groupIndex =Â 1) {

å›¾ç‰‡ç”Ÿæˆç»“æœ</title>\n    <style>\n        body {\n            font-family: 'Open Sans', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;\n            display: flex;\n            flex-direction: column;\n            align-items: center;\n            justify-content: flex-start;\n            min-height: 100vh;\n            background-color: #121212;\n            color: #e0e0e0;\n            margin: 0;\n            padding: 20px;\n        }\n\n        .container {\n            width: 90%;\n            max-width: 800px;\n            text-align: center;\n            background: linear-gradient(145deg, #1e1e1e, #242424);\n            padding: 32px;\n            border-radius: 16px;\n            box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);\n            margin-bottom: 32px;\n        }\n\n        .image-container {\n            margin-bottom: 24px;\n        }\n\n        .image-container img {\n            max-width: 100%;\n            height: auto;\n            border-radius: 12px;\n            border: 2px solid #333;\n            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;\n        }\n\n        .image-container img:hover {\n            transform: scale(1.02);\n            box-shadow: 0 12px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);\n        }\n\n        .style-text {\n            font-size: 18px;\n            margin: 24px 0;\n            color: #bbb;\n            padding: 12px;\n            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);\n            border-radius: 8px;\n        }\n\n        .cta {\n            display: inline-block;\n            width: auto;\n            min-width: 200px;\n            margin: 20px 0 0;\n            padding: 16px 32px;\n            border: none;\n            border-radius: 8px;\n            text-decoration: none;\n            color: #fff;\n            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1C9985, #20B69E);\n            font-size: 18px;\n            font-weight: 500;\n            cursor: pointer;\n            transition: all 0.3s ease;\n        }\n\n        .cta:hover {\n            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #20B69E, #25D4B8);\n            transform: translateY(-2px);\n            box-shadow: 0 8px 16px rgba(28, 153, 133, 0.3);\n        }\n\n        .recent-renders {\n            width: 90%;\n            max-width: 800px;\n            display: grid;\n            grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);\n            gap: 24px;\n            margin-top: 32px;\n        }\n\n        .recent-render {\n            background-color: #2c2c2c;\n            padding: 16px;\n            border-radius: 12px;\n            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;\n        }\n\n        .recent-render:hover {\n            transform: translateY(-4px);\n            box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);\n        }\n\n        .recent-render img {\n            width: 100%;\n            height: auto;\n            border-radius: 8px;\n            border: 2px solid #333;\n            transition: transform 0.3s ease;\n        }\n\n        /* éšè—é¢å¤–çš„å›¾ç‰‡ */\n        .recent-render:nth-child(n+5) {\n            display: none;\n        }\n\n        /* æ˜¾ç¤ºæ›´å¤šæŒ‰é’®æ ·å¼ */\n        .show-more-label {\n            display: inline-block;\n            width: 90%;\n            max-width: 800px;\n            margin: 32px auto;\n            padding: 16px;\n            background: #2c2c2c;\n            color: #fff;\n            border: none;\n            border-radius: 8px;\n            font-size: 16px;\n            cursor: pointer;\n            transition: all 0.3s ease;\n            text-align: center;\n        }\n\n        .show-more-label:hover {\n            background: #333;\n            transform: translateY(-2px);\n        }\n\n        /* éšè—å¤é€‰æ¡† */\n        #show-more {\n            display: none;\n        }\n\n        /* å½“å¤é€‰æ¡†è¢«é€‰ä¸­æ—¶æ˜¾ç¤ºé¢å¤–çš„å›¾ç‰‡ */\n        #show-more:checked ~ .recent-renders .recent-render:nth-child(n+5) {\n
